languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to an ally, that ally also gains +1 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for every action point gained until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g}, применяя {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, дает союзнику {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, этот союзник также получает +1 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} за каждое полученное ОД до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Leader's ability grants action points to an ally, that ally also gains +2 to all characteristics for every action point gained until the end of combat.
Whenever the Leader's ability grants action points to an ally, that ally also gains +2 to all characteristics for every action point gained until the end of combat.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to an ally, that ally also gains +1 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for every action point gained until the end of combat.

Whenever the Leader's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to an ally, that ally also gains +1 to all characteristics for every action point gained until the end of combat.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to an ally, that ally also gains +1 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for every action point gained until the end of combat.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g}, применяя {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, дает союзнику {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, этот союзник также получает +1 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} за каждое полученное ОД до конца боя.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to an ally, that ally also gains +1 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for every action point gained until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Когда лидер, применяя способность, дает союзнику ОД, этот союзник также получает +2 ко всем характеристикам за каждое полученное ОД до конца боя.
Когда лидер, применяя способность, дает союзнику ОД, этот союзник также получает +2 ко всем характеристикам за каждое полученное ОД до конца боя.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}为盟友提供额外的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}时，每提供1点行动点数，该盟友所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}都会+1，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to an ally, that ally also gains +1 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for every action point gained until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 每当领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}为盟友提供额外的行动点数时，每提供1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，该盟友所有属性都会+2，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Cada vez que una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} otorgue puntos de acción a un aliado, ese aliado también gana +1 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} por cada {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}punto de acción{/g} obtenido hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to an ally, that ally also gains +1 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for every action point gained until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} del oficial otorgue puntos de acción a un aliado, ese aliado también gana +1 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} por cada {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}punto de acción{/g} obtenido hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offiziers{/g} einem Verbündeten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g} gewährt, erhält dieser Verbündete außerdem bis zum Ende des Kampfes für jeden gewonnenen Aktionspunkt +1 auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to an ally, that ally also gains +1 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for every action point gained until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Offiziers einem Verbündeten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g} gewährt, erhält dieser Verbündete außerdem bis zum Ende des Kampfes für jeden gewonnenen Aktionspunkt +1 auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} confère des {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g} à un allié, ce dernier bénéficie également de +1 à toutes ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} pour chaque point d'action gagné jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to an ally, that ally also gains +1 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for every action point gained until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} du Leader confère des points d'action à un allié, cet allié bénéficie également de +2 sur l'ensemble des caractéristiques pour chaque {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}point d'action{/g} gagné jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}オフィサー{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}が味方に{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}を与える際、その味方は獲得したアクションポイント1点につき、戦闘終了まですべての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}が+1される。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to an ally, that ally also gains +1 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for every action point gained until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: リーダーの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}が味方にアクションポイントを与える際、その味方は獲得した{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}1点につき、戦闘終了まですべての能力が+2される。
